subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|死不了|死不冥目|死不瞑目|死中求生|死乞白賴|死亡|死亡人數|死亡率|死亡筆記|死人|死仗|死信|死傷|死傷者|死刑|死別|死到臨頭|死區|死去|死去活來|死命|死囚|死因|死守|死寂|死對頭|死屍|死巷|死後|死心|死心塌地|死心眼兒|死戰|死敵|死文字|死於安樂|死於非命|死有餘辜|死期|死板|死棋|死機|死機藍屏|死死|死水|死活不顧|死海|死海古卷|死海經卷|死灰復燃|死無對證|死無葬身之地|死生|死產|死症|死皮賴臉|死硬|死神|死穴|死結|死結難解|死絕|死緩|死罪|死者|死而不僵|死而後已|死而無悔|死衚衕|死裡逃生|死角|死訊|死記|死記硬背|死賬|死路|死難|死難者|死馬當活馬醫|死鬼|死麵|死點|死黨|亂石砸死|人死|作死|假死|傷心致死|兇死|冒死|冤死|凍死|出生入死|刺死|勒死|半死|卡死|去死|吊死|哀莫大於心死|垂死|堵死|壞死|大難不死|安樂死|害死|將死|尋死|弄死|心肌梗死|愛莫大於心死|慘死|打死|打蛇不死|扼死|找死|拚死|拼死|捨生忘死|掐死|揍死|摔死|撞死|早死|昧死|會死|束手待死|梗死|橫死|殉死|殊死|殺死|氣死|治死|淹死|溺死|瀕死|炸死|無名戰死|燒死|猝死|生死|生老病死|疼死|病死|砍死|砸死|絞死|縊死|臨死|致死|處死|要死|詐死|該死|誓死|貧血性壞死|貪生怕死|賊死|賜死|赴死|逼死|過勞死|醉生夢死|釘死|長生不死|養生送死|餓死|驟死|嚇死|死狀|死鴨子嘴硬}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
Appears to be a [[conflation]] of {{der|ja|sort=し|ltc|死|tr=sij<sup>X</sup>}} (compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''sǐ'') with an {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=し}} root that happened to have a similar pronunciation to the {{etyl|ltc|-}} and was probably cognate with {{m|ja|去る|tr=saru||to go, to go away}}.

In kanji compounds, this would be considered as {{m|ja|音読み|sc=Latn|on'yomi}}; on its own, this could be considered as either [[音読み#Japanese|on'yomi]] or [[訓読み#Japanese|kun'yomi]].

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
{{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}:
* {{ja-r|死ぬ|しぬ}}: to [[die]]

{{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}:
* {{ja-r|死%因|し%いん}}: [[cause]] of [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死王|しおう}}: a dead [[king]]
* {{ja-r|死王|^しおう}}: the [[Buddhist]] [[king]] of the [[dead]]
* {{ja-r|死火|しか}}: a dead [[flame]], a [[fire]] that has [[gone out]]; {{qualifier|Buddhism}} the [[flame]] of [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死火%山|しか%ざん}}: an [[extinct]] [[volcano]]
* {{ja-r|死花|しか}}: [[paper]] [[flower]]s used for a [[funeral]]
* {{ja-r|死花%花|しか%ばな}}: a [[decoration]] used at [[funeral]]s consisting of white [[paper]] [[fringe]]s on vertical [[stake]]s
* {{ja-r|死貨|しか}}: a [[currency]] that is no longer [[circulate]]d; any [[asset]] that is [[hoard]]ed and not [[circulate]]d
* {{ja-r|死%海|^し%かい}}: the [[Dead Sea]]
* {{ja-r|死%灰|し%かい}}: [[cold]], [[dead]] [[ash]]es; the [[ash]]es remaining after [[cremation]]
* {{ja-r|死%界|し%かい}}: the [[underworld]], the [[world]] of the [[dead]]; a [[blind spot]], somewhere [[out of view]]
* {{ja-r|死%骸|し%がい}}: a [[corpse]], a [[cadaver]]; a [[carcass]]
* {{ja-r|死%角|し%かく}}: a [[blind spot]], somewhere [[out of view]]; [[dead]] [[ground]] where launched [[projectile]]s do not fall
* {{ja-r|死%学|し%がく}}: a [[field]] of [[study]] that has no [[practical]] [[use]]
* {{ja-r|死%活|し%かつ}}: [[life]] and [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死 勘定|し かんじょう}}: a [[dead]] [[account]], a [[trading]] account that has no [[activity]]
* {{ja-r|死期|しき}}, {{ja-r|死期|しご}}: the [[time]] of [[death]], the [[moment]] of one's death
* {{ja-r|死球|しきゅう}}: in [[baseball]], a [[pitch]] that hits the [[batter]], resulting in a free [[walk]]
* {{ja-r|死去|しきょ}}: one's [[death]], one's [[passing]]
* {{ja-r|死境|しきょう}}: one's [[place]] of [[death]]; a [[deadly]] place
* {{ja-r|死菌|しきん}}: a [[dead]] [[bacterium]] or [[inactive]] [[virus]] used as the [[basis]] for a [[vaccine]]
* {{ja-r|死句|しく}}: a [[plain]] [[phrase]] or [[line]] in a [[poem]], containing no [[imply|implied]] [[meaning]]s; {{qualifier|Buddhism}} an [[ascetic]]'s [[unsaid]] [[word]]s or [[phrase]]s, due to [[mental]] [[mistake]]s
* {{ja-r|死苦|しく}}: {{qualifier|Buddhism}} the [[suffering]]s of [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死%刑|し%けい}}: [[capital punishment]], the [[death penalty]], [[execution]]
* {{ja-r|死%結|し%けつ}}: a kind of [[fragrant]] [[wood]] used in [[incense]] that is only fragrant years after [[harvest]]ing
* {{ja-r|死後|しご}}: the [[time]] [[after]] one's [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死語|しご}}: a [[dead language]]
* {{ja-r|死%罪|し%ざい}}: a [[capital crime]], a [[capital punishment]]
* {{ja-r|死屍|しし}}: a [[dead]] [[body]], a [[corpse]]
* {{ja-r|死守|ししゅ}}: [[defense]] to the [[last]] [[man]]
* {{ja-r|不死|ふし}}: [[undying]], [[immortality]]
* {{ja-r|不老 不死|ふろう ふし}}: [[agelessness]] and [[immortality]]
* {{ja-r|死所|ししょ}}: a [[place]] of [[death]], the [[place]] where one [[dies]]
* {{ja-r|死生|ししょう}}, {{ja-r|死生|しせい}}: [[life]] and [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死相|しそう}}: an [[appearance]] as if one were already [[dead]], the [[shadow]] of [[death]], the [[look]] of death
* {{ja-r|死蔵|しぞう}}: [[put away|putting]] something [[put away|away]] and never using it
* {{ja-r|死地|しち}}: a [[dead]] [[place]]; a [[place]] so [[dangerous]] that one [[expect]]s to [[die]] there
* {{ja-r|死闘|しとう}}: a [[fight]] to the [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死人|しにん}}: a [[dead]] [[person]]; a [[corpse]]
* {{ja-r|死者|ししゃ}}: the [[dead]]
* {{ja-r|死%体|し%たい}}: a [[cadaver]]
* {{ja-r|死%物|し%ぶつ}}: something [[unused]], [[useless]], or [[unusable]]
* {{ja-r|死文|しぶん}}: a [[dead]] [[law]], a [[law]] that is on the [[books]] but never [[enforced]]; a [[document]] that is purely [[formal]] and [[empty]] of [[meaning]]
* {{ja-r|死%別|し%べつ}}: [[bereavement]]
* {{ja-r|死%没|し%ぼつ}}: [[death]], [[dying]]
* {{ja-r|死命|しめい}}: [[life]] and [[death]], [[fate]]
* {{ja-r|死霊|しりょう}}, {{ja-r|死霊|しれい}}: the [[spirit]] of a [[dead]] [[person]], a [[ghost]]
* {{ja-r|死%力|し%りょく}}: [[strength]] or [[exertion]] as if one were [[avoid]]ing [[imminent]] [[death]]: with all one's [[might]]
* {{ja-r|死去|しきょ}}: [[passing]], [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死刑|しけい}}: the [[death]] [[penalty]], [[execution]]
* {{ja-r|死傷|ししょう}}: a [[mortal]] [[wound]] or [[injury]], [[casualty]]
* {{ja-r|死亡|しぼう}}: [[passing]], [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死%滅|し%めつ}}: [[extinction]], [[die out|dying out]]
* {{ja-r|頓死|とんし}}: [[sudden]] [[death]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Verb
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|し|o1=に}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|死ぬ|tr=shinu||to die}}.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|死%後|しに%あと}}: the [[time]] [[after]] one's [[death]], particularly referring to the time after the death of one's [[spouse]]
* {{ja-r|死%一%倍|しに%いち%ばい}}: a kind of [[loan]] whereby the [[borrower]] must repay [[double]] the loan amount upon the [[death]] of the borrower's [[parent]]s and subsequent [[inheritance]] of parental [[asset]]s
* {{ja-r|死%軍|しに%いくさ}}: a [[fight to the death]]
* {{ja-r|死%絵|しに%え}}: a [[print]] or [[poster]] of a famous [[actor]] created on the occasion of that actor's [[death]], noting the actor's [[posthumous]] [[name]], place of [[burial]], and [[time]] of death
* {{ja-r|死%顔|しに%がお}}: the [[face]] or [[facial]] [[expression]] of a [[dead]] [[person]]
* {{ja-r|死%覚%悟|しに%かく%ご}}: being [[prepared]] to [[die]], [[readiness]] to die
* {{ja-r|死%学%問|しに%がく%もん}}: a [[field]] of [[study]] that has no [[practical]] [[use]]
* {{ja-r|死%掛|しに%かけ}}: [[dying]], the [[act]] of dying
* {{ja-r|死%金|しに%がね}}: [[money]] [[save]]d in reserve to cover the [[cost]]s of one's own death; [[money]] that is [[hoard]]ed but not [[use]]d; [[money]] [[spent]] to no [[effect]], [[waste]]d money
* {{ja-r|死%神|しに%がみ}}: the [[god]] of [[death]], [[Death]]
* {{ja-r|死%極|しに%ぎわめ}}: [[determination]] or [[resolution]] to [[die]]
* {{ja-r|死%狂|しに%ぐるい}}: [[crazy]] enough to [[die]]; [[crazy]] because one is [[unready]] to [[die]] and [[fear]]s [[death]]
* {{ja-r|死%気|しに%げ}}: a [[sense]] of [[death]], [[deathliness]]
* {{ja-r|死%業|しに%ごう}}: the [[karma]] of one's [[previous]] [[life]] that causes one's death in this life; a [[death]] attributed to [[karma]]
* {{ja-r|死%外|しに%はずれ}}: the act of just barely avoiding death
* {{ja-r|死%花|しに%ばな}}: [[posthumous]] [[fame]] or [[honor]]; an [[exceptional]] and [[memorable]] way of [[dying]]
{{der-bottom}}
